technology.short_description: "Dem gobbos are already good at sneakin', just gotta make 'em betta at stabbin'."

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblins, Goblin Archers, Pump Wagons and Nasty Skulkers
Weapon strength: +10% for Pump Wagon units
Melee attack: +2 for Goblin and Night Goblin infantry units

technology.short_description: "Gotta hand it to those Forest Goblins, easy to get dead wranglin' massive spiders. Better dem than us!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Spider Riders and Goblin Spider Rider Archers
Recruitment cost: -10% for Spider Rider units
Leadership: +2 for Spider Riders units
Melee attack: +2 for Spider Rider units

technology.short_description: "Da ladz ain't got da best aim, but at least we can make 'em hurt fings more!"

effects.description: Scrap Upgrades Unlocked for: Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult
Ammunition: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units
Missile strength: +10% for Goblin Rock Lobber and Doom Diver Catapult units

technology.short_description: "So many shiny fings! We need a bigga cart so we make sure we gets it all!"

effects.description: Income from raiding: +20%

technology.short_description: "We's gonna need a bigga loot cart…"

effects.description: Income from sacking settlements: +10%

technology.short_description: Now I ain’t lettin’ d’ese hummies, stunties, or whateva, break in and steal my stuff! To battle!

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when under siege

technology.short_description: Da stunties are too small to be much fun fighting for long. Da boyz need somethin’ bigger ta prove themselves!

effects.description: Attribute: Charge Defence vs. Large for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +1 for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units

technology.short_description: Away from the demands of the more bossy Orcs, the gobbos can finally get a little work done… when they feel like it.

effects.description: Ability: "Squigs go Boom! for Goblin Big Bosses"

ui_effects.localised_text: Spawn a unit of Explosive Squig
Almost no damage against single entity units

technology.short_description: Oi’, when you need da gobbos to keep ‘em busy for awhile while da bigga stuff hits ‘em from the sides, give ‘em d’ese mushrooms ‘aforehand.

effects.description: Attribute: Immune to Psychology for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

technology.short_description: Even da regular greenskins stay outta dis mob’s way.

effects.description: Cooldown: -10% to all spells
Miscast base chance: -5%

technology.short_description: It’s best not to ask what’s in this stew.

effects.description: Vigour loss reduction: -20% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.short_description: "Someone tell those gits to move those legs fasta or we'll send da Squigs after 'em!"

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10%

technology.short_description: "If we tell da ladz to kill each other less, dey can kill da enemy more!"

effects.description: Attrition: -25% casualties suffered from all attrition
Income from post-battle loot: +5%

technology.short_description: "Dey taste like death, but do da opposite!"

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10%

technology.short_description: Greenskins from all over da badlands flock to da boss’s tribe, an’ he only takes da best!

effects.description: Character's aura leadership effect: +5
Leadership aura size: +25%

Weapon strength: +10%
	(all characters factionwide)

technology.short_description: First one into da fray gets an extra necklace of teef!

effects.description: Recruitment cost: -40% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units

technology.short_description: Or are they Gork’s…

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.short_description: "Get dem wolf pups when dey's young, makes 'em easier to train without gettin' ya bits bitten off!"

Recruit rank: +1 for Boar, Wolf and Spider Rider units

technology.short_description: "We stole da designs from da stinkin' Elves!"

Ammunition: +8% for missile infantry units

technology.short_description: "Shamans are nasty buggers as it iz, but Raknik iz one depraved gobbo!"

effects.description: Adds the Goblin Great Shaman Raknik Spiderclaw to your faction's Lord pool

technology.short_description: "If da gits can't run fasta, make 'em hide betta!"

effects.description: Hero action cost: -10%
Hero action success chance: +5%

technology.short_description: "Ya can't teach a fish to climb a tree, but ya can teach a Troll to hit fings harder!"

Recruit rank: +1 for Trolls, River Trolls and Stone Trolls units

technology.short_description: "Love 'em equally, or else…"

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with all factions
Hero recruitment cost: -25%

technology.short_description: Da black orcs have been gettin’ bored, so they’ve started attacking da boyz when d’ere not paying attention. All da boyz are on edge now.

effects.description: Melee defence: +4 for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units

technology.short_description: Grown above some buried dwarven runic stones, these mushrooms confer a bit of dwarven resilience to the greenskins that eat them. Well, to the ones that survive eating them.

effects.description: Spell resistance: 20% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units

technology.short_description: Or… nevermind.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +40% for Savage Orcs, Trolls, Rogue Idols, Wyverns and Giants units

technology.short_description: "Those stoopid gobbos are throwin' stuff at us boss, and dey’s enjoyin’ it too. Put ‘em to betta use!"

Armour: +5 for Goblin units
Missile strength: +8% for Goblin and Night Goblin missile infantry units

technology.short_description: "Shuddup, da lot of ya! Or da Boss'll have ya!"

effects.description: Control: +2

technology.short_description: Some of those Savage loons brought d’ere war paint to da Boss as a gift. He musta been in a good mood because he had da boyz paint d’ere armor with it.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 10% for Boyz, Big 'Uns and Black Orcs units

technology.short_description: Come get some reds, they are da best, they'll make ya strong!

Reload time reduction: +10% for all Goblins, Squigs, Artillery and Spiders units

technology.short_description: Bang, bang, boom, march to da war beat!

technology.short_description: "Da gobbos been gettin' a bit angsty. Maybe we should give 'em some toys to play with."

technology.short_description: "Give da orcy boyz a bit more smashin’ practice, let ‘em bring da gobbos back in line."

effects.description: Leadership: +2 for Orc units

technology.short_description: "Maybe those gobbos iz deservin' of some respect and en-cur-rage-ment?"

Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Goblin units

technology.short_description: "I dunno what we was thinkin', Boss... da gobbos is definitely expendable, dey make da best fodder!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Goblin infantry units
Ammunition: +25% for Doom Diver Catapult units

technology.short_description: "Gettin' a bit crowded 'round 'ere lately. Put da gits to good use!"

technology.short_description: "We's gonna share more of da loot, Boss. Share more with you I mean!"

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10%

technology.short_description: "A bit of protect-shun for da ridey-ladz means more of 'em survivin' to squash fings."

Armour: +15 for Arachnarok Spider units

technology.short_description: "Da more scrap we can carry, da more stuff we’s gonna make for da killin’!"

effects.description: Scrap: +10 per turn

technology.short_description: "Have ya eva seen such a pretty site? There aint nuthin' greena or meana than a full-blown Waaagh!"

Experience gain: +10% for units

technology.short_description: “I’m da boss! Now git out there and krush dem all”

Experience gain for units: +25% when fighting against Rebels

technology.short_description: "A lazy gobbo's a useless gobbo. Let's give 'em somefink to get angry about!"

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Goblin units
Speed: +5% for Goblin and Night Goblin units
Charge bonus: +10% for Night Goblin units

technology.short_description: "Make sure everyone's payin' dues, Boss. Send da boys out for a spot of teef collectin'."

technology.short_description: "Dey be stinkin', stoopid, n' flea-ridden, but dem boars be pretty good in a fight!"

technology.short_description: "I know a guy… he's pretty 'orrible."

effects.description: Adds the Orc Warboss Oglok the 'Orrible to your faction's Lord pool

technology.short_description: "Sometimes I fink dem Shamans are just wingin' it, but if dey's helpin' I ain't complainin'!"

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5
Magic item drop chance: +10%

technology.short_description: "Corr its 'evy! Too 'evy! Save it for da big 'uns!"

Physical resistance: 10% for Rogue Idol units
Weapon strength: +20% for Giant units

technology.short_description: "Da new rule of murderin' anyone we don't recognise iz workin' well, I fink."

technology.short_description: Nothing beats a crafty gobbo when trying to find a way into an enemy city.

effects.description: Siege towers: +1 per siege item constructed

technology.short_description: There’s nothing snotlings do better than stealing anything which is not nailed down.

effects.description: Income from raiding: +25%

technology.short_description: “Stop act'n like 'umiez an' tuffen up! Now go give ‘em a good smashin’!”

effects.description: Constant casualty replenishment rate: +2%

technology.short_description: “I iz da biggest, ‘ardest boss in all da world!”

effects.description: Hero recruit rank: +2

technology.short_description: “OI! Lissen ta me wen I’z talkin’ to ya! We’z gonna go in ‘dere city, we’z gonna smash it up an’ kill anyfing dat gets in our way, an’ den we’z gonna go home. Dat’ll show ‘em. Do you lot unnastand dat? Good. Now, wiv me: WAAAGH!”

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +25 with Greenskins

technology.short_description: “We’re da best. Think diffrent do ya? Come an ‘ave a go then, ya runty little wimp!”

effects.description: Growth: +30

technology.short_description: "Bigga camps means a bigga tribe, and more ladz for fightin’!"

Growth: +10

	(all provinces)

technology.short_description: "If we send some of da big 'uns, I'm sure dey can 'convince' some of da other tribes' ladz to join us…"

Leadership: +2 for Orc units

technology.short_description: "Let’s see how dem useless gobbos work when we withhold some of their rations."

effects.description: Construction cost: -10% for all buildings

technology.short_description: "The betta the metal, the betta the murderin'!"

technology.short_description: "Who doesn't like a bigga club? Means bigga heads gettin' bashed."

technology.short_description: "All ya gots to do iz sharpen dem Squiq teeth and strap a few on an axe. Might lose a finger or two doin' it, tho."

technology.short_description: "Of course dey's not as good as you boss, but dey's still pretty good."

technology.short_description: "Each of these 'ere boys iz one of da ladz now, Boss. Makin' us proud!"

technology.short_description: “Ain't noth'n more important dan smash'n dis city so jus keep yer eyes on 'da prize!”

technology.short_description: “We ain't leav'n until yer've nabbed all da shiny fings off dese stunties!”

technology.short_description: Fungal brew speeds up Greenskin recovery but has the added effect of intoxicating them. It’s not the first time an orc has gone into battle drunk, and it won’t be the last.

technology.short_description: What the biggest orcs lack in intelligence, they more than make up for in strength and muscle.

technology.onscreen_name: Bash for Gork. Stab for Mork
technology.short_description: “Da best part of bein’ a greenskin: ‘dere’s always more greenskins ta bash! Da problem wiff dem humies, ‘dere so squishy, and ‘dere’s never enuff of ‘em ta go around.”
